actions.description: The mangler makes two Claw attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage. If the attack roll has advantage, the target also takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: The mangler makes six Claw attacks. Either before or after these attacks, it can move up to its speed without provoking opportunity attack.
actions.name: Flurry of Claws (Recharge 5-6)

specialTraits.description: The mangler has advantage on initiative rolls.
specialTraits.name: Ambusher
